name: CONDROVET速 Force HA large breeds
description: Condrovet速 Force HA Large Breeds is a dietary supplement recommended to protect the joint of large dog breeds. Chondroitin sulfate and Glucosamine HCl are essential components of joint cartilage and help to maintain joint functions and mobility. Mobilee速, thanks to its Hyaluronic Acid content, helps to properly maintain the synovial fluid, which is essential to recover joint mobility. Native type II collagen b-2Cool速 helps to preserve the endogenous joint collagen.
